Professional Experience

Junior Web Developer

August 2020 - May 2021

NexTech AR Solutions

An augmented reality company that integrates AR into product visualizations, hybrid and virtual events, augmented learning, and eCommerce & advertising.

  • Completed upwards of 5 virtual event pages for trade shows, conferences, and college science labs per week with full page responsiveness.
  • Communicated and collaborated with team members about recurring issues, potential fixes to the templates to improve latency or other performance issues, and discuss JavaScript logic or code architecture before moving forward with multipage integration for readability efficiency.
  • Built pages such as lobbies, breakout rooms, resource libraries, interactive agendas (some with user specific capabilities), and integrated new widgets or updated API calls from old templates with extremely tight deadlines.
  • Utilized photoshop basics to improve assets visually as well as for server upload and page weight.

Leading NW subspecialty center for treatment resistant depression and other psychiatric conditions.

  • Responsible for administering transcranial magnetic stimulation and Spravato treatment to 14 or more patients per day suffering from psychiatric conditions.

  • Researched and organized necessary clinical information on each patient resulting in a seamless and caring experience throughout the patientsâ€™ plan of care.
